root.name: root
root.message: You shake your head 'Sorry kids, I don't have time for these games'. Just as you try to leave you see deep mists close in around you, swallowing up the village. As more buildings disappear into the mists, you are left with little choice but to seek refuge in the house.
choices: Stay outside and try to find a way outside the mists

c1.name: c1
c1.message: You feel the mists swallow you. The thick mists do not allow you to breath at all. It starts to get black before your eyes, if you don't seek refuge quick you fear you might suffocate.

final.name: final
final.message: You feel your last breath leave your body as everything turns black. It appears that yet another innocent soul has fallen victim to the Death House.

responses.comment: The final from the intro is the last checkpoint but I am not sure if we should rather make use of the 'checkpoint' key.
I don't know how to end the game
